items.title: Best Dividend Stocks: McDonald's vs. Domino's
items.author: Parkev Tatevosian, Cfa
items.description: Passive income investors have an excellent choice between Domino's Pizza and McDonald's, two leading companies in the food industry. The article provides a comparative analysis of these two options, highlighting their potential for generating passive income.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article presents Domino's Pizza as a viable option for passive income investors, suggesting it is an excellent choice.
The article presents McDonald's as a viable option for passive income investors, suggesting it is an excellent choice.
